SEARCH
Modul de.hitec.nhplus
Package de.hitec.nhplus.model

Klasse Caregiver

java.lang.Object
de.hitec.nhplus.model.Person
de.hitec.nhplus.model.Caregiver
public class Caregiver extends Person
Represents a caregiver in the system.

Extends the Person class with additional details like phone number, active status, and the date the caregiver became inactive.

  • Eigenschaftsübersicht

    Von Klasse geerbte Eigenschaften de.hitec.nhplus.model.Person

    firstName, surname

  • Konstruktordetails

    • Caregiver

      public Caregiver(String firstname, String surname, String phoneNumber, boolean active, LocalDate inactiveSince)
      Constructs a new Caregiver without an ID.

      This constructor is typically used to create caregiver objects before they are saved in the database.

      Parameter:
      firstname - Caregiver's first name.
      surname - Caregiver's last name.
      phoneNumber - Caregiver's phone number.
      active - Active status.
      inactiveSince - Date since the caregiver became inactive.

    • Caregiver

      public Caregiver(Long cid, String surname, String firstname, String phoneNumber, boolean active, LocalDate inactiveSince)
      Constructs a new Caregiver with an existing ID (used for loading from the database).
      Parameter:
      cid - Caregiver ID.
      surname - Last name.
      firstname - First name.
      phoneNumber - Phone number.
      active - Active status.
      inactiveSince - Date since the caregiver became inactive.

  • Methodendetails

    • getCid

      public long getCid()
      Gibt zurück:
      the ID of the Caregiver object.

    • getPhoneNumber

      public String getPhoneNumber()
      Gibt zurück:
      the phone number of the Caregiver.

    • setPhoneNumber

      public void setPhoneNumber(String phoneNumber)
      Parameter:
      phoneNumber - as string

    • isActive

      public boolean isActive()
      Returns whether the caregiver is currently active.
      Gibt zurück:
      true if the caregiver is active, false otherwise.

    • setActive

      public void setActive(boolean active)
      Sets the caregiver's active status.
      Parameter:
      active - true if the caregiver should be marked as active, false otherwise.

    • getInactiveSince

      public String getInactiveSince()
      Returns the date since the caregiver has been inactive.
      Gibt zurück:
      the date the caregiver became inactive, or null/empty if still active.

    • setInactiveSince

      public void setInactiveSince(String inactiveSince)
      Sets the date since the caregiver has been inactive.
      Parameter:
      inactiveSince - Date in format YYYY-MM-DD.

    • getActiveStatus

      public String getActiveStatus()
      Returns the activity status of the caregiver as a string.
      Gibt zurück:
      "Active" if the caregiver is active, otherwise "Inactive".

    • toString

      public String toString()
      Returns a string representation of the caregiver object.
      Setzt außer Kraft:
      toString in Klasse Object
      Gibt zurück:
      formatted caregiver data.
